title: Love Where You Live! Come and Tour The 95 Today!
map_address: 7100 W Alexander Rd near Alexander and Tenaya
posting_body: The 95 offers quiet comfort with quaint studios with Murphy beds, as well as spacious one- and two-bedroom apartments.
All our apartments come with fully appointed kitchens, dishwasher, microwave, breakfast bar and walk-in closets.
The community amenities feature sparkling swimming pool for relaxing, convenient on-site laundry facilities, a pet park and covered parking.
Call today to schedule your private tour!
Organic Vegetable Garden • Easy Access to Red Rock and Mt. Charleston • Energy Star Certified • Covered Parking • Laundry Facilities • Night Patrol •
Home Wi-Fi Ready with Pre-Installed Modem and 1st Month Free, provided by COX • Signature LUX Series • Signature Modern Series • Fully Furnished • Air Conditioner •
Disposal • Electronic Thermostat • Microwave • Refrigerator • Window Coverings
Pets - Max 2 allowed Comments: Pet Friendly!
Pet Fee: $150.00 (Non-Refundable), Additional Pet(s): $150.00 each (Non-Refundable), Monthly Pet Rent: $30.00/1 pet; $50.00/2 pets; (Limit 2).
Restrictions: Pit Bull, Staffordshire Terrier, Rottweiler, Doberman Pinscher, Chow, Malamute, Akita, Wolf-Hybrids, and any mix containing any of these breeds.
